subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods finished the Bridgestone Invitational with an even-par 70, for a 15-under total of 265 and his eighth career victory at Firestone Country Club in Akron, Ohio.
snippet: Tiger Woods finished the Bridgestone Invitational with an even-par 70, for a 15-under total of 265 and his eighth career victory at Firestone Country Club in Akron, Ohio.
